## isBoardEmpty() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Determine if a game board is empty.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isBoardEmpty(board: GameBoard): boolean;
```

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean

true if there are no tiles on the board, false otherwise.
